snippet: The New Orleans police charged two brothers with 20 counts of attempted murder in connection with a parade shooting spree on Sunday that wounded 20 people.
abstract: New Orleans police charge brothers Akein and Shawn Scott with 20 counts of attempted murder in connection with a parade shooting spree that wounded 20 people.
lead_paragraph: The New Orleans police charged two brothers with 20 counts of attempted murder in connection with a parade shooting spree on Sunday that wounded 20 people.

headline.seo: Louisiana: 2 Arrested in Shootings at New Orleans Parade
headline.main: Louisiana: 2 Arrested in Shootings at New Orleans Parade
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: 2 Arrested In Shootings at New Orleans Parade
